gene.function: FUNCTION: Microtubule-binding protein required to ensure proper cell division and nuclear envelope reassembly by sequestering the endoplasmic reticulum away from chromosomes during mitosis. Probably acts by clearing the endoplasmic reticulum membrane from metaphase chromosomes. {ECO:0000269|PubMed:23911198}.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Endoplasmic reticulum membrane {ECO:0000250}; Multi-pass membrane protein {ECO:0000250}.
